📝 The Straits Times  Log in  Manage account Subscribe Log out    From local to global: What made top news in Singapore over the last 180 years? What makes the news? A look back at 180 years’ worth of fr...
articles.content: The Straits Times  Log in  Manage account Subscribe Log out    From local to global: What made top news in Singapore over the last 180 years? What makes the news? A look back at 180 years’ worth of front-page headlines – from the very first edition of The Straits Times on July 15, 1845 – shows that news is everywhere: from right at your doorstep to the world beyond and more. BY CHEE WEIXIAN, ELIZABETH LAW AND LEE PEI JIE | PUBLISHED: JULY 15, 2025   Toa PayohChoa Chu KangOrchardPunggolClementiAn
